oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hotchkiss shell from Big Creek engagement
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This relic Hotchkiss artillery shell was found on the field of an engagement on Big Creek near Rogersville on November 11, 1863 between Gen. James Longstreet's Confederates and Union forces under Gen. Israel Garrard. This shell would have been fired by Union rifled guns belonging to the 2nd Illinois Battery.
